about_the_game:
"

Grizelda's Cursed Curiosities



From: Scoundrel Game Labs


Grizelda's Cursed Curiosities is a compendium of 15 ghost-themed adventures for 5E. This tome of adventures builds off of the tools from the
Guide to Ghost Hunting . You'll see new monsters, haunts, and an array of exciting and spooky adventures. Some of the highlights of this project include:
  • Adventures scale to every party level. No need to hunt through the book for the one adventure that works for your party.
  • Haunts, monsters, and more from Guide to Ghost Hunting are implemented in the book.
  • Props and handouts galore. Each adventure has some type of creative prop, handout, or puzzle. 
  • Beautiful art by the same team that brought you
    Guide to Ghost Hunting
In addition to the collection of adventures, we'll also include everything you need to make the haunted curio shop - Grizelda's Cursed Curiosities - a drop-in location for your campaign. Every adventure is tied to an item found in the shop. As your players browse, they might come across a weird trinket, a useful magic item, or an unexpected hook for their next adventure. "
